Comments_List: So much. What a great introduction to method-based, contemporary acting. I feel more confident as an actress after this class.
We learned a lot about given circumstance, finding ease, and the interaction between physicality and emotion. It was very valuable in providing great skills for a theater maker.
Shilarna Stokes is an incredible professor! I learned how to work with people and how to approach material in an all new way.

Strengths include the great attention given to each student so everyone can grow at his or her own pace.  Everyone was given the opportunity to shape what they want to be learning and to excel at individually set goals.
Yes, definitely, if you want to go into theater at all, please take this! It'll give you the basics you need.
I would absolutely recommend this course to any theater-maker. It is a great way to really delve into the world of theater. I learned a lot in a truly no-stress environment.
